CustomField.description: Used to determine for which categories the matching of policies WITH numbers will be by product as well as the number (in case same policy number received for 2 different products). All Other non specified categories - the productions with prod defs belonging to them - will be matched to policies by numbers only. If no csv specified then all categories\product defs will be matched by number AND product
CustomField.label: Match By Num And Prod Cats Csv
